description: Tawni “The Shark” Ryden just got JACKED UP! The Goddess breaks the current US scoring record, scoring 870 points. She gets The Shark to orgasm THREE times on the mat! But Isis was still not satisfied! She went on to get three submissions out of the high-spirited Shark as well. But let us give credit were credit is due: The Shark never once gave in and she fought to the end with the same energy she started with… but having Isis’ fingers relentlessly jammed in her pussy proved to be her Achilles heel.
title: The Goddess (12-7)
